description: man with a gaunt face on the left side of the image in a suit and tie looking at the viewer; on the right side of the image an oval cosmetic mirror on a stand reflects the man's face in profile
inscription: LRC in plate: W.G. 19 | LL of sheet, in pencil: Japan | LLC of sheet, in pencil: E 135 | LRC of sheet, in pencil: 28 [encircled] | LLC of sheet in pencil, on verso: 146 38
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 19 | LL in pencil, below image: Der Mann am Spiegel
title: The Man at the Mirror
